extendedInfo.description: Most popular and comprehensive password generator in Android Market!"Really great. Obviously coded by somebody familiar with common password attack methods. Thanks!" (5 stars) -- tcpiplab (April 5, 2011)Did you find it painful to create a password that is secure, complex but still easy to remember? Or, are you a administrator who need to generator a lot of initial random passwords for users? Advanced Password Generator can help you do the job more efficiently!Among a large number of average password generation apps in the Market, some exclusive features make Advanced Password Generator outstanding:* The *only* app that contains 3 complete different password generation algorithms!* Fully customizable generation options* Generate random passwords that contains letters, digits, and (or) special characters* Generate passwords using characters from your own character set* Batch Generation: make a list of 100+ random passwords and send them via email== 3 Different Password Generation Methods ==* Random Passwords: Secure passwords that contain lower-case and upper-case letters, digits and special characters.* Pronounceable Password: Built from random syllables and very similar to real words, which made remembering easier.* Memorable Password: a grammar-based random password generator that uses real English words to generate passwords that are very easy to memorize, while being able to withstand automated password cracking attack.== Testimonies =="Excellent Generator I use it daily. Works perfectly, no complaints. Thanks!"-- Brian (August 26, 2011)"Very clever, versatile, easy to use. Best of the ones I've tried."-- James (November 30, 2010)"Great work! Works great no issues so far. Like that your able to choose what characters are use to form your password. reviews.title: Great App.
reviews.comment: Does what is says it is designed to do...  Great app. when you need a good password quickly.
reviews.author: Sinatra Williams

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Galaxy Tab 8.9 Great app. Not really much more to say.  I love the password convention options and strength indicator.  Working in a security environment that requires frequent password changes, this will definitely come in handy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy S III
reviews.comment: Would give all 5s if it would not generate a new password everytime my phone sleeps. Often before I have recorded it.
reviews.author: Wilma Williams

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: Does what it says. I switch up passwords all the time. Good to have when you need a password on the fly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great app! Just what I needed. Would look better if it expanded full screen on my galaxy tab but that\'s a minor detail
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best ever!
reviews.comment: Best password generator on the market!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish!
reviews.comment: It is unuseable as it generates a new password each time the screen locks/sleeps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This is exactly what I need.  I like being able to generate batches of passwords.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Phred you\'re an idiot!!!! Total useless waste of space you are! Get adfree!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just needs one tweak
reviews.comment: I\'ll give a five if you can add the ability to specify the minimum number allowed for each type of character.  This would save me having to batch run and then manually weed out those with too few small, caps, numbers, or symbols.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Always using it. Work very well. Password gened Simple to remember but complex to be guessed. Good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works wonderfully with my Vizio tablet. I have not encountered any problems what so ever.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Advance Passwoed Generator
reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great product!
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good Memorable Passwords
reviews.comment: Just generate until a phrase sticks in your mind, and you\'ll have a stronger password than most people!
reviews.author: Ryan Hitchman

reviews.comment: No way to adjust length of \"memorable\" passwords.I cannot remember passwords that are 18+ digits long.Can adjust length in other 2 modes. Not for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great work!
reviews.comment: Works great no issues. Very easy to use and your able to choose what characters are use to form your password and the length. Samsung Note I
reviews.author: A Google User
